basic_info.description_header: Writing Programs is Like Writing Poetry
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm Dasha (day-sha) Burgos. Thank you for visiting my portfolio. I am a Navy veteran and I pivoted to Software Development after serving seven years in the service. There I learned skills and experience in troubleshooting, aircraft, teamwork, and leadership. I now work in an IT Help Desk role in which I have experience in software coaching, admin access, content development, and application troubleshooting. I earned my degree in Criminology, but I knew deep down that I have a passion for coding that began in college. I see the emergence and growth in the development of tech over the years. I want to be involved in this technological revolution that is bound to change the world. I am an agile worker that thinks independently and more than capable of working in a team environment. Through my years of experience, I learned to be agile and adaptable in any environment all-the-while excelling in my job responsibilities. Thank you for taking the time out to visit my profile! ðŸ’•

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: This is application is a basic use of React. The application takes an array of objects and puts that information into a component to render it on the page and when an image is clicked, the particular info on the card is displayed on a modal. There is also a component to sort the data by a key in the object.

projects.title: Off-Grid Odyssey
projects.description: Class group project building a text based game using vanilla JavaScript. We were able to render data in one large object and use a function to display the info on the page as well as local storage to persist the score on a DOM table.

projects.title: Odd-Duck
projects.description: Early project that uses Object Oriented Programming with vanilla JavaScript that uses constructors for the data, local storage to persist data, and Chart.js to display the table.
